title: Textile, ca. 1890
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave; highly glazed
printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: Thin, highly glazed chintz, roller printed; background a pale grey-blue; largeclusters of roses and other garden flowers, and sprays of wheat; rose, mauve, Blue-green and pale yellow.
